title: Sign Language Interpretation
description: This project enables real-time sign language interpretation through hand gesture recognition using computer vision techniques and streaming technology.

title: Electric Vehicle Maintanenece Scheduling
description: Developed an electric vehicle maintenance system with ESP32 PCB, integrating sensors and ML clustering, tested online with Wokwi before offline implementation.

title: Contactless DoorBell System
description: Designed a contactless doorbell system with ESP32 CAM for image capture and real-time notifications. Implemented secure communication for enhanced user privacy.

title: Table Tennis using Hand Gesture
description: Revolutionary AI-powered hand motion detection technology enhances table tennis gameplay through real-time tracking and gesture recognition, promoting accessibility and improving player techniques.

title: MapQuest
description: MapQuest: A memory-based game in Godot Engine where players must memorize maps and select the correct location to progress through levels.
